children.name: Governer
children.information: HonorableThiru Banwarilal Purohit,Governor of Tamil Nadu is the Constitutional Head of the state.

children.name: Chief Minister
children.information: Hon'ble Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu Thiru Edappadi K. Palaniswami is the Head of the elected Government and heads the Council of Ministers.
